description: '''Partyschlager''' (also called ''Party-Schlager'' and ''Partymusik'') is a form of [[schlager]] that has been popular since the 1990s, using stylistic elements from [[Eurodance]], [[Electronic dance music|EDM]], and Hands Up. Within partyschlager, there are various categories based on themes and occasions, such as Ballermann, après-ski, carnival, Oktoberfest, or Wiesn hits.
